result.name: total-facilities-management-and-computer-aided-facilities-management-system
result.notes: Interserve computer system which holds records of all maintenance on DSA buildings, statutory inspections and PPM regime for the DSA estate. Includes out of hours emergency contact details. No personal details are held in terms of staff, only name of individual making a call about reactive works and their telephone number.

organization.name: driving-standards-agency
organization.title: Driving Standards Agency
organization.description:
The Driving Standards Agency (DSA) was replaced by Driver and Vehicle Standards Agency (DVSA) in April 2014.

DSA was an executive agency, sponsored by the Department for Transport.

It existed from 1 April 1990 to 31 March 2014.

Find out more at https://www.gov.uk/dsa.

result.title: Total Facilities Management and Computer Aided Facilities Management system
